documents.document: Taking a selfie without fumbling with headphone cables is 👌🏼I’m happy to review the @AfterShokz Wireless Trekz Titaniums so stay tuned in a few weeks. First run went well! #aftershokzcabr #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/Xsb62dmW5m

If your next destination race is in Seattle (like say... @RunRocknRoll #RnRSeattle ) then you'll want to check out the Infinite Energy Seattle City Guide. Get running routes and see local BibRavePros' favourite spots. #BibChat #BrooksBR #sponsored https://t.co/Cow58uwv4E https://t.co/8NpzNuu5lY

These mouth-watering donuts from Top Pot are just some of the treats you can find in Seattle. If you're headed to #RnRSeattle check out the Infinite Energy Seattle City Guide for more food inspirations and more! #bibchat #brooksbr https://t.co/6Wm9JfF5oO https://t.co/pYICtgHosr
Such a pretty medal!!! @westvanrun Summer will be 🔥🔥🔥#racebling #westvanrun #bibchat #westvancouver #vancouver https://t.co/om7jZSaG4l
ICYMI My recap of this year's @BMOVanMarathon half marathon is up on the blog. Already looking forward to next year's race. #bibchat #bmovm #runvan https://t.co/SMlccGI0uP https://t.co/5Wpm87wgrx
@Jacki_66 @BMOVanMarathon Oh ok. That’s too bad you’re having that problem.
@Jacki_66 @BMOVanMarathon Oh are you sure we have the same pack? I didn’t think there was a winter or summer version of mine. It’s the adv skin set 5.
@Jacki_66 @BMOVanMarathon Oh weird... I don't notice it at all actually. But I also didn't bring the bladder that goes in the back and the insulation sleeve. Did you have those on you?

Less than 2 weeks until @westvanrun Summer! Bring the family and run the mile, 5k or both! Details on the blog & use code JEANNINE for an added discount! #westvanrun #bibchat #westvancouver #vancouver https://t.co/N3rCSkmnkL https://t.co/4E8oiWlU80

I remember powering through to the finish at @BMOVanMarathon a few weeks ago. I just posted my recap of the #halfmarathon on my blog. Reminisce with me! #bibchat #runvan #bmovm https://t.co/HAFMiK7hIb https://t.co/LWhk8ZXC5v

My BMO Vancouver Marathon Half Marathon recap is finally up on the blog! It was a beauty of a day. #bibchat #runvan #bmovm https://t.co/WTNfnBKLzY

Hope you all had a great long weekend! Cuski and I spent it in Winthrop, WA and I ran Rainshadow Running Sun Mountain 25k on Sunday. Here's a glimpse of race day, what a beautiful place to run. Blog post to come! #bibchat #trailrunning

I ran my first 25k race in the heat and it was a battle. The views and gorgeous course was worth my sore feet and legs. Thanks @Rainshadowrun for an epic Sun Mountain experience. #bibchat #bibravepro #teamnuun #nuunlife https://t.co/HPc5tNRoyt

5 Peaks Trail Running Srae Nedlog (Golden Ears 2.0 / Golden Ears backwards) was so fun! Handed out some pretty neat Swiftwick Socks swag, high-fived and gave out ribbons at the kids race, and ran my fastest Enduro race so far. Proud to be part of the trail crew.
RT @westvanrun: We’re back to 25C temperatures this Saturday, and so run along the shore is in order! ☀️🌊 Going to hit all piers along the…
Thanks for the neck gaiter @nuunhydration 🙌🏼 This will be well-used, I’m sure! #teamnuun #nuunlife #nuunbassador https://t.co/AjDurTWfIF
@BibRave A5 it makes a huge difference if I eat the right thing. It’s a make or break for me. #bibchat
@BibRave A4 I feel like when I try food that's effective, I end up not wanting to eat it and am searching for other things. It's been oatmeal or PB&J sandwiches for breakfast lately. #bibchat
@BibRave A3 Lack of time - when we're both training and we don't plan ahead, we end up with fast food or breakfast for dinner. Anything easy and quick #bibchat
@BibRave A2 Not really, my food intake remains the same which is probably not a good thing lol #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Right now, I work out 5 days a week: 2 days on the road, 1 strength day, and 2 days on the trail on the weekend (or 1 road, 1 trail) - it's definitely not boring :P #bibchat
@BibRave Hi! Jeannine here from Vancouver. Don’t really have a favourite, I try to bring leftovers but if I can’t, it’s sushi or pad Thai for me. #bibchat https://t.co/0vlDIVGGjN
Mid-year applications are now open, so if you want to be a @BibRave Pro, now's the time to apply! Good luck! #bibchat #bibravepro #orangeisthenewfast https://t.co/b2rIolpcwv
